Song.title: Nothing but the Blood of Jesus *Simplified Chords*

Arrangement.text:
[Verse 1] Wh[G]at can wash aw[Em]ay my sin? N[G]othing but the [C]blood of [D]Jes[G]us. W[G]hat can make me w[Em]hole again? N[G]othing but the [C]blood of [D]Jes[G]us.
[Chorus]
[G]Oh, precious is the flow, T[D]hat makes me white as sn[C]ow; [G]No other [Em]fount I know, N[G]othing but the [C]blood of [D]Jes[G]us.
[Verse 2] [G]For my pardon, [Em]this I see, [C/G]Nothing but the [Em]blood of [D]Jes[G]us [G]For my cleansing [Em]this my plea [C/G]Nothing but the [Em]blood of [D]Jes[G]us
{new_page}
[Verse 3] [G]Nothing can for [Em]sin atone [C/G]Nothing but the [Em]blood of [D]Jes[G]us [G]Naught of good that [Em]I have done [C/G]Nothing but the [Em]blood of [D]Jes[G]us
[Verse 4] [G]This is all my [Em]hope and peace [C/G]Nothing but the [Em]blood of [D]Je-[G]sus [G]This is all my [Em]righteousness [C/G]Nothing but the [Em]blood of [D]Jes[G]us
Arrangement.searchtext: what can wash away my sin nothing but the blood of jesus what can make me whole again nothing but the blood of jesus oh precious is the flow that makes me white as snow no other fount i know nothing but the blood of jesus for my pardon this i see nothing but the blood of jesus for my cleansing this my plea nothing but the blood of jesus nothing can for sin atone nothing but the blood of jesus naught of good that i have done nothing but the blood of jesus this is all my hope and peace nothing but the blood of jesus this is all my righteousness nothing but the blood of jesus
